content:
## n8n@0.85.0 For a comprehensive list of changes, check out the [commits](https://github.com/n8n-io/n8n/compare/n8n@0.84.4...n8n@0.85.0) for this version.
**Release date:** 2020-09-30 - Enhanced nodes - Postgres: Added Schema parameter for the Update operation - Bug Fixes - Jira: Fixed a bug with the Issue Type field - Pipedrive Trigger: Fixed issues with the credentials - Changed the bcrypt library to `bcrypt.js` to make it compatible with Windows - The OAuth callback URLs are now generated in the backend
